entry.title: $2700 // ***BRAND NEW, STUNNING 3 BEDROOM/2BATHROOM APT BY 'L'&'M' TRAIN***
entry.content:
Gorgeous, brand new 3 bedroom/2 bathroom apartment in Bushwick on the 2nd floor available NOW.

There are high-end finishes throughout the apartment including tall ceilings, gorgeous new hardwood floors, all stainless appliances (microwave, stove, dishwasher, refrigerator with ice and water maker installed), and stunning piano white cabinets with granite countertops. The bathrooms have carrara marble throughout, controllable heated floors, heated towel racks, and non-fog mirrors. Smallest bedroom has the private bathroom. There are closets in every bedroom.

The apartment also has a laundry closet with a washer and dryer. The apt has 3 bedrooms, an enormous living room that can fit a dining table as well, a kitchen with gorgeous marble floors, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, and 2 bathrooms.

The closest subway stops are the Knickerbocker Av / Myrtle Av "M" train and Myrtle-Wyckoff Avenues "L" & "M" train.

Apartment is in a very convenient location right next to grocery stores, salons, shopping areas, gyms, coffee shops etc...

Please call/text Richard (the property manager) if you have questions or would like to schedule a time to see the apartment. 917-600-7446

Fee Disclosure:$100 Application Fee & NO BROKER FEE.

$2,700.00/month. 1st month's rent. 1 month security deposit. Pets must be pre-approved.

Landlord pays for heat.

1 Bed / 1 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Morgan Av, Flushing Av. Introducing 115 Stanwix, your sanctuary away from the day to day grind. Designed to allow you to focus on living your life with a home automation system, you can preprogram temperatures based on the time and day of the week. Turn the lights off and adjusting the thermostat sitting on on your couch or laying in bed. Building includes co-working space with conference rooms, gym, library, screening room a ground floor mail room, indoor lounge, Banquette lounge, Rooftop lounge and garden.
